android.smartcard
Class Terminal

java.lang.Object
  android.smartcard.Terminal
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITerminal
Direct Known Subclasses:
SmartMxTerminal, UiccTerminal
public abstract class Terminal
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITerminal

Smartcard service base class for terminal resources.

transmit

public byte[] transmit(byte[] cmd,
                       int minRspLength,
                       int swExpected,
                       int swMask,
                       java.lang.String commandName)
                throws CardException
Transmits the specified command and returns the response. Optionally checks the response length and the response status word. The status word check is implemented as follows (sw = status word of the response):

if ((sw & swMask) != (swExpected & swMask)) throw new CardException();

Parameters:
cmd - the command APDU to be transmitted.
minRspLength - the minimum length of received response to be checked.
swExpected - the response status word to be checked.
swMask - the mask to be used for response status word comparison.
commandName - the name of the smart card command for logging purposes. May be null.
Returns:
the response received.
Throws:
CardException - if the transmit operation or the minimum response length check or the status word check failed.
